content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing “automation” research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}, status: NO_POWER).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"] and connection points at positions (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with status NO_FUEL, warning “out of fuel”, a fluid box holding water (amount ≈189.51, temperature 15), connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), and fluid_system [62694] (steam output at (-7.5, 24.5)).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with WORKING status, linked to fluid_system [62694] and a connection point at (-9.5, 23.5).
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 62694 at position(-5.5, 19.5) (status: WORKING)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 62693 at position(-2.5, 19.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 62706 at position(5.5, 21.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 62705 at position(1.5, 23.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 62701 at position(-7.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 62710 at position(0.5, 24.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 62709 at position(1.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 62712 at position(1.5, 27.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 62713 at position(4.5, 27.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 62714 at position(-0.5, 28.5) (status: EMPTY)

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Pipeline Connection & Fluid Transfer:
  - Ensure both source and target connection points are unobstructed, within range, and share matching fluid system assignments.

• Entity Placement & Collision Avoidance:
  - Confirm that target tiles are unoccupied before placing entities.

• Buildable Area Calculation:
  - Use correct placement attributes to avoid type errors during position determination.

• Pipe Group Identification & Fluid System Mapping:
  - Verify that pipe groups with the required fluid_system are present near the intended connection points.
  - Review fluid system assignments if repeated candidate searches yield no valid pipe groups.

• Steam Engine Repositioning Failures:
  - Multiple repositioning attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system values (62030, 62114, 62196, 62280, 62362, 62446, 62528, 62612) failed to locate valid candidates within the search radius.
  - Ensure the candidate’s fluid system identifier matches the updated network values (e.g., 62694) and adjust the search radius or selection criteria accordingly.

• Boiler Fuel Supply Management:
  - Monitor and replenish boiler fuel promptly to maintain operational status.

• General Connection Strategies:
  - Review environmental constraints and inventory levels prior to executing repositioning or pipeline attachment actions.
